Allentown.Dorneyville, Pennsylvania: Dorneyville is a census-designated place located in Lehigh County, Pennsylvania, USA. Dorneyville is located just west of Allentown, Pennsylvania in South Whitehall Township and Salisbury Township. Dorneyville is located off Interstate 78 and is home to the northern terminus of U.S. Route 222. It is split between the Allentown zip codes of 18103 and 18104.
